unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Necessary evil, right? Lost my jowar crop last year near Nagpur because of unseasonal rain. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana might help. Anyone had good experiences? Thinking of signing up on 26/01/2024. It's risky farming in Maharashtra, especially after 15/08/1947. Wondering if claims are easy to get after 17:00 hrs. Rs. 5000 per acre premium seems high though. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Necessary evil, right? Lost my jowar crop last year near Nagpur because of unseasonal rain. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana might help. Anyone had good experiences? Thinking of signing up on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four. It's risky farming in Maharashtra, especially after fifteenth August nineteen forty seven. Wondering if claims are easy to get after five PM. Rupee five thousand per acre premium seems high though. Jai Kisan!
